activities: Company will be collecting personal human resource and health information from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland, for the purpose of administering various human resource services and insurance services, assistance services to EU/EEA clients, administering products and coordinating benefits for EU/EEA clients and other such administrative practices. This includes collecting personal human resource information with the express or implied consent of the EU/EEA client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
orgverification: In house verification through annual audits
personaldata: Personal data may be obtained in the form of name, address, personal identification number, medical records, medical history, salary information, and other sensitive personal data.  Some of this information may be manually entered into the company's insurance system loacted in the United States.
recoursemech: We will be using both the EU Panel that has been set up to hear unresolved complaints and AAA Arbitration services
